headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Onsemi (ON) After The Recent Share Price Rise?
summary: If you are wondering whether ON Semiconductor at around US$62 per share offers good value today, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you frame that question clearly. The stock is up 14.7% over the last 30 days and 9.7% year to date, with a 16.8% return over the last year. However, the 3 year return of 24.3% and 5 year return of 63.2% show a very different longer term picture. Recent coverage around ON Semiconductor has focused on its role in the broader semiconductor sector...
